messages.text: Hi! I saw your profile and I just had to reach out. You have the most beautiful smile.
Oh thank you! That's so sweet. Do I know you?
Not yet, but I feel like I've been looking for someone like you my whole life. I'm an engineer working overseas.
That's interesting, where are you based?
I'm on an oil rig right now, but I'll be back in Canada soon. I already feel such a strong connection with you. Can we talk every day?
I think I'm falling for you. I've never felt this way about anyone so quickly.

redFlags.label: Excessive flattery and declarations of love very early
Pushing for daily contact and exclusive emotional bond
Claims to be in a remote location (oil rig) making meetings impossible

messages.text: Hey! I think I have the wrong number, but how are you doing today?
I think you do have the wrong number lol
Haha well maybe it was fate! I'm Jessica, I work in finance. What do you do?
I work in retail. Nothing fancy.
Don't say that! I actually started small too. I've been doing really well with crypto trading lately. Made $12K last month on this platform my uncle showed me.
I could show you how it works if you want? You just need to put in a small amount to start, like $200. The returns are incredible.

redFlags.label: Encouraging a small initial deposit to build trust

messages.text: URGENT: This is Service Canada. Your Social Insurance Number has been compromised in a fraud investigation.
You must verify your identity immediately or your accounts will be frozen. Reply with your full name and SIN.
Is this real? How do I know you're actually from Service Canada?
This is an official notification. If you do not comply within 24 hours, the RCMP will be notified and a warrant may be issued.

redFlags.label: Creating urgency through threats of arrest or account freeze
Requesting SIN and personal identity information
Unsolicited contact claiming to be a government agency

messages.text: Hey! Are we still on for coffee tomorrow at 2?
Yes! The place on Queen St?
That's the one. See you there!
Sounds good, see you tomorrow!
